Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens voice actors

nodes.text: Michael David Donovan (born June 12, 1953) is a Canadian voice actor and director who portrayed the voices of First Order stormtroopers, a PA announcer on Starkiller Base, and a member of a Resistance medical team in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. His identity was revealed by Matthew Wood in a post on StarWars.com.
